channel.title: NovaMinecraft [PvP] [Survival] [Creative] [Multiverse]
channel.description:
server ip: novaminecraft.com
Nova Minecraft is a 24/7 survival, games, and creative server with many various fun thing to do! Defend and protect in survival! Or wanna show off your creative side? Our creative portal is a great option!
The ranks we have so far are:
- Head Management - Management - Admin - Mod - Developer - Player - Guest
We have many great plugins that we keep adding to. Just some of our major plugins include: Essentials, LWC, World Edit, World Guard, PermissionsEX, Multiverse, and many, many more!
Come and see for yourself the amazing design at spawn, the many great things people have built, the friendly staff, and the fun we have! Join the community today at: novaminecraft.com
